response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored specifically to your needs and interests, is worth $1,200,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price that reflects its true worth and benefits you would derive from it. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive and designed to ensure that you receive the best possible deal while allowing me to maximize the value of the product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1150000}
